text: Mattia Gallon (born May 30, 1992) is an Italian professional footballer who plays for Lucchese as a forward . ==Club career== He made his Serie A debut for Cagliari on 28 March 2010 in a game against Sampdoria. On 17 August 2019, he joined Serie D club Licata. He left the club in December 2019, to join another Serie D club, Lucchese.Lucchese, ingaggiato l’attaccante Mattia Gallon, luccaindiretta.it, 5 December 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:People from the Province of Oristano Category:Footballers from Sardinia Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Italy youth international footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Cagliari Calcio players Category:A.C.D.
